body_html: We have no plans to refactor it in this manner. However, opensource is awesome! If you're willing to do the work, you could certainly move the code out and maintain it separately. I think a filesystem abstraction library would be a great addition to the Python ecosystem, and if a well maintained option emerges, we would consider depending on it as well.

body: We have no plans to refactor it in this manner. However, opensource is awesome! If you're willing to do the work, you could certainly move the code out and maintain it separately. I think a filesystem abstraction library would be a great addition to the Python ecosystem, and if a well maintained option emerges, we would consider depending on it as well.
